tables.table_schema:
-- Table for data cleansing and transformation
CREATE TABLE DataCleansing (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  order_date DATE,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE TransformationProcesses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(10),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DataQualityImprovement (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  metric_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  improvement_method TEXT,
  improvement_status TEXT
);
